column3: In 2022, we recognized a loss of $4 million (including $3 million of premium and other costs) on the extinguishment of debt. In 2020, we recognized a loss of $75 million (including $65 million of premium, fees and other costs paid with the tender offers and unamortized debt issuance costs). See Note 12 for additional information.
Sum of the individual amounts may not add due to rounding.
